text: (dutare,) avaralli kelavaru, nim'ma matannu alisuttare. Taruvaya nim'ma baliyinda horatu hoda balika, jnana nidalagiruvavarodane, (enannu keladavarante) ‘‘ata iga tane heliddenannu?’’ Endu keluttare. Allahanu anthavara manas'sugalige mudre ottiruttane mattu avaru tam'ma sveccheyanne anusarisuttare
